name: FringeworldColonizationProject (FCP)
description:
**FringeworldColonizationProject (FCP)** On their way to a new planet the FringeworldColonizationProject-Ships were attacked by pirates. The ships made an emergency landing on an uncharted world. Planned Features:
- No Units popping out of barracks, 1 Colonist = 1 Marine, 0 Colonists = 0 Units
- 2 special units for each Mission (Different ways to solve main and bonus objectives)
- Managing food, water, and energy supply
- Trading/Fighting with other factions
author: _ForgeUser4811330
